Summary Note:
The RM is a close family friend of Krol Vogel Visser's parents, having known him since birth. This deep-rooted connection has facilitated a strong and trustworthy professional relationship.
Krol Vogel Visser is a 44 year old Director of Operations from Netherlands. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Krol Vogel Visser and Friso tied the knot in 2012. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Krol obtained his secondary school diploma from Veenlanden College Zoetermeer in 1998.
After that, he went on to study at Utrecht University until 2004.
Krol earned his additionally degree from Hogeschool van Amsterdam in 2009.
Occupation History:
Krol Vogel Visser is a seasoned professional with over 20 years of experience.
In 2005, Krol Vogel Visser started working as a Aerospace Engineer at NLR - Netherlands Aerospace Centre, marking the beginning of his successful career.
In 2009, he moved to Fokker Technologies B.V. to work as a Program Manager, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
At Fokker Technologies B.V., he worked as a Director of Operations from 2012 till now, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 450000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 2 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Amsterdam and Tilburg, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
In 2012, he received an inheritance of 4070000 EUR from his late father, who was a prominent Private Equity Manager, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Krol as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
